response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which we believe has immense value and could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and potential benefits, we estimate its worth to be well above $1,200,000. Considering the high quality and unparalleled capabilities of this product, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This offer is designed to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a fair return on our investment. We believe this is a win-win opportunity for both parties. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1500000}
